title: Integrated Forensic Education Materials Utilization Course

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing Forensic Mathematics Education Materials for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments, Project-Based Assessment Systems, and Capacity Building for Corporate Educators

learning_goals: Learners can select and integrate 6-15 minute online forensic science materials for application in instructional design
Learners can create project design proposals by linking web-based resources collected in an LMS environment with mathematics education modules
Learners can propose three or more effective strategies for utilizing digital educational materials accessible in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
